title: Australian PM hails 'proud day' as social media ban begins - but teens are not so sure
content: The social media accounts of millions of Australians aged under-16 must be deactivated, with companies potentially facing fines for not complying.

title: Thailand-Cambodia fighting spreads along border as death toll rises
content: At least six people have been killed in the most serious confrontation between both sides since a ceasefire was brokered by US President Donald Trump in July.

title: Critical moment to ramp up support for Ukraine, European allies say
content: Volodymyr Zelensky and the leaders of France, Germany and the UK held talks in London to discuss the latest US efforts to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Sample reuters article (fallback)
content: This is a fallback article from reuters. Web scraping may be blocked or the site structure may have changed.

title: Inside Syria's jail for IS suspects as officials say attacks by group are rising
content: Kurdish counter-terrorism officials tell the BBC so-called Islamic State cells in Syria are regrouping and increasing attacks.

title: Two arrested over theft of jewels at Louvre museum in Paris
content: Four thieves broke into the world's most-visited museum in broad daylight, stealing eight items worth €88m (£76m; $102m).
